entry.value: #############################################################%%00010# #%%00010# QMRA for Salmonella Enteridis in eggs #%%00010# (outputs) - Moez Sanaa #%%00010# #%%00010#############################################################%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010par(mfrow=c(1,2))%%00010%%00010#library(plotly)%%00010%%00010%%00010# Barplot risk salmo%%00010#y_hbar <- list(title = "Number of illness per million servings of egg")%%00010#plot_ly(%%00010# x = c("Linghtly eggs", "Well-cooked eggs"),%%00010# y = c(Rlcuit,Rbcuit),%%00010# name = "Salmonella risk",%%00010# type = "bar") %>% layout(xaxis=x_hbar,yaxis=y_hbar)%%00010%%00010# alternative%%00010barplot(c(Rlcuit,Rbcuit),names.arg=c("Lightly cooked","Well-cooked"),xlab="Cooking methods of eggs",%%00010 ylab="Number of illness per million servings of egg",ylim=c(0,250),axes = T,col="royalblue")%%00010abline(h=0,col="black")%%00010abline(h=c(50,100,150,200),col="lightgrey")%%00010text(0.5,Rlcuit+5,round(Rlcuit,digits=2))%%00010text(2,Rbcuit+5,round(Rbcuit,digits=2))%%00010%%00010%%00010# color plot%%00010%%00010Age_oeuf=out[,3]%%00010data_oeuf<-cbind(Age_oeuf,Risque)%%00010#x_plot <- list(title = "Egg age (day)")%%00010#y_plot <- list(title = "Probability of illness when ingesting a random serving of egg")%%00010#plot_ly(x = Age_oeuf, y = Risque, mode = "markers", color = Age_oeuf, %%00010# size = Age_oeuf)%>%layout(xaxis=x_plot,yaxis=y_plot)%%00010%%00010#alternative%%00010#par(mfrow=c(1,1))%%00010plot(x = data_oeuf[which(data_oeuf[,1]<=3),1], y = data_oeuf[which(data_oeuf[,1]<=3),2],%%00010 xlim=c(min(Age_oeuf),max(Age_oeuf)+5), ylim=c(0,max(Risque)),col="yellow",%%00010 xlab="Egg age (day)",ylab="Probability of illness when ingesting a random serving of egg")%%00010points(x = data_oeuf[which(data_oeuf[,1]>3 & data_oeuf[,1]<=7),1],%%00010 y=data_oeuf[which(data_oeuf[,1]>3 & data_oeuf[,1]<=7),2],col="green")%%00010points(x = data_oeuf[which(data_oeuf[,1]>7 & data_oeuf[,1]<=9),1],%%00010 y=data_oeuf[which(data_oeuf[,1]>7 & data_oeuf[,1]<=9),2],col="cyan")%%00010points(x = data_oeuf[which(data_oeuf[,1]>9),1],y=data_oeuf[which(data_oeuf[,1]>9),2],col="royal blue")%%00010i<-(1:16)/4000%%00010rect(max(Age_oeuf)+2,i,max(Age_oeuf)+3,i+0.001,col=rainbow(16,start=1/6,end=4/6))%%00010text(round(max(Age_oeuf)+4,digit=0),min(i),round(min(Age_oeuf),digit=0))%%00010text(round(max(Age_oeuf)+4,digit=0),mean(i),round(mean(Age_oeuf),digit=0))%%00010text(round(max(Age_oeuf)+4,digit=0),max(i),round(max(Age_oeuf),digit=0))%%00010

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
